Reviews.Title: Highly recommended especially if you're tired of Windows based OS!
Reviews.Author: R. Urruchi "The One"
Reviews.Content: Awesome laptop once you know how Google products work in order to get the most out of this computer. I also like how quickly it boots up.  It is also a perfect device for users who like cloud services. After researching this computer online, I found that Google Docs can be saved as a Word doc, can be used "offline", and I found all the necessary steps to reboot in case there is a problem with the OS, how to 'clean' the computer if necessary, and steps on how to add your own screensaver. There is a 'Get Started' app which takes the user through many important features for beginners. The keyboard feel as comfortable and easy on the fingers as my Windows PC.  I love that updates are in the background so I would not have to be kicked out like in Windows based OS. I also like that security is built-in so that I don't have to purchase anti-virus/spyware/malware or set up nightly or weekly updates.  The laptop is very light and I have no problems with brightness and the colors are vivid when watching movies. I have used my USB stick which houses all my Word docs and have had no problems accessing those files.  I would definitely recommend this for those tired of Windows based OS!

Reviews.Title: Great Chromebook
Reviews.Author: M. Smith
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace a Samsung chromebook that was dropped.I love the larger and brighter screen.  It is much easier to read than the Samsung.  It is a good weight too.  Not to heavy.It comes on very fast and I can browse the internet with speed!It works with a chrome printer just fine and printer setup was a breeze!I am very happy with this computer!

Reviews.Title: great for the technology impaired people!
Reviews.Author: mason hong
Reviews.Content: i had heard  about chrome books but i decided to buy one for my parents after their 7 year old windows laptop gave out. Since all they do was check email and watch videos online i gave it a shot since it was fairly cheap. Best decision i every made. the chrome browser is exactly the same as the windows one so that didn't need explaining also its light weight and since its a chrome operating system and not windows, its very hard to get a virus on it (just like a mac)Pros:cheap, easy to use, fast start up time(around 5 seconds), 720p hdmi out, light weightcons: only 16gb of storage, very small battery, flash is buggy sometimes but tolerable,  no programs (no skype,firefox,ect)overall: i would highly recommend this for anyone just looking for a laptop to surf the web and nothing else.i also recommend buying a SD card to expand storage because this does have a SD card slot.but i would only buy this around $250. $300 is a bit high for me because of the weak processor  and lack of a hard drive. I really wish i could install chrome os on my old laptop because it uses very little resources unlike windows.tips: if you usually use skype your can use google hangouts to video chat!. if you use office, you can use google docs(might take some time to learn the new format) but its almost as good! and its free.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected, by far.
Reviews.Author: jeffrey ulrich
Reviews.Content: Beautiful machine that is fast as lightning, I can't believe how rugged this feels compared to the smaller chromebooks. This machine is built to last with quality construction and a sturdy keyboard, it's not a cheap product at all. The functions perform flawlessly and can run numerous apps at once with zero lag, ZERO!!! The drawback is no optical drive, but I purchased through HP a USB multi drive and now the system is totally dialed in. I Love It! I can do any office app through Google office and I couldnt be happier.Thanks HP for continuing to make kick ass products. I am a loyal HP fan for life. 2nd HP computer purchase this year and they just keep getting better! Good Job and great engineering!! Keep it up.

Reviews.Title: This Is The Future!
Reviews.Author: Steven Campos
Reviews.Content: Lets just say that when it comes to do anything a computer does this Chromebook does it. First of all if your looking to put Photoshop or any other CPU intensive program this is not the laptop for you. There is no CD drive. It only has USB ports and HDMI port. I have always used Windows and Windows is great but as I figured out real quick this Chromebook can do all of that it.Google whole basis for this is something called "cloud computing." Nothing is downloaded to your hard drive. Instead it all goes to your Google Drive. If you need something you need you can download an "app". Google Docs is the the Microsoft equivalent of Office. And its available online or offline. It does take some getting use to. You can save pictures, videos, musics etc to Google Drive. Everything you do is done on Google Chrome. For some people doing everything in a web browser is unheard of.Perhaps my favorite thing about this Chromebook is that the fact there is no software at all needed for it. No CD's or anything just open it and you can get started. One thing to note is that you must have internet for it. Your not completely limited if you don't but to get the most out this Chromebook you need internet. I am always on the go and have internet so this isn't a problem for me.As far as looks go I like it. The screen may not be HD but its big enough and honestly why do you need an HD screen on a laptop anyways? It is fast. Does not lag no matter what I do. Watch Netflix or go on YouTube. There is slight "hum" but that's about it. You can even put it in your lap and does not get too hot. It also has a camera in the front and its of pretty good quality. Battery life is amazing. The keyboard is nice. Sound is LOUD. Best part of all it turns on in under 10 seconds. No other computer or laptop on the market can do that.Overall this Chromebook is meant for the person who is just looking to do easy things such typing documents or suffering the web. You can't do anything graphic intense as this Chromebook is not meant for that. Remember this is meant for your average person. Not for your gamer (that's what a game console is meant for) or photo editor. Just remember this is what the future is.

Reviews.Title: This is the future!!!
Reviews.Author: Donald Castellano-hoyt
Reviews.Content: I had done my research for months prior to buying this Chromebook. I like the 14 inch screen and 4g ram. I have gotten adequately enough acquainted to finish my latest book using Google Docs.There were times when I had to use my desktop simply for research, copy, and paste functions. Nonetheless I actually plan to buy another one fairly soon (probably an 11 incher) just because it travels well and boots fast!The rest of the family still struggles with the desktop 'wait time' while I can check my emails and be off my Chromebook within a minute!I like that Google lived up to its promise and gave me 2 years' of storage (100 g). Thank you!

Reviews.Title: I love my chromebook
Reviews.Author: Daniel DeArment
Reviews.Content: I will probably never buy another Windows machine.  It is lightweight, boots fast, and battery is good.  Love the screen size, it is just right.  Net books are not for me.  I wish it had a lighted keyboard and it doesn't play well with printers.  I was going to order a cloud printer, but instead I used my old lap top with a busted screen and set it up as a print server to run with the lid closed using Google cloud print.  Problem solved.  Never have to worry about a virus and my stuff is synced into chrome.  The free online storage plan is awesome.  Google nails it again.  Works great with chrome cast.Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: GREAT Clout machine
Reviews.Author: S. Odemis
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd clout laptop this year. My daughter and I love it very much. I purchased one for my friend too. People complain that its not compatible with windows, must understand this is a new way of doing things. Its all about cloud computing, I can save all my files and folders on my google drive. I dont have to worry about loosing my stuff anymore in case my windows machine breaks down. It has an universal printer driver so I dont have to install driver after driver for different peripheral and slow my machine down. I do not need to worry about virus checker either. It comes with a solid state Hard drive. I have been using this machine over the last 2 weeks and it works great. User friendly. I dont have to wait 5 minutes to boot up my machine. It boots up instantly. I think it takes about 3 seconds or something like that. My daughter is 10 years old and she finds it easy to use. So there!

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop for non windows users.
Reviews.Author: Donald W Bowling
Reviews.Content: This is my first ChromeBook and let me say it is great.  I own three laptops and Google OS is very easy to use, I finally think I have a replacement for Windows, since I have never been a fan of Windows my whole life.  I have been using Apple, and Linux mostly and this is by far the easiest.

Reviews.Title: Ideal for use by non-techy types who struggle with Windows
Reviews.Author: Andrea Polk
Reviews.Content: Recently I purchased a 'scratch n' dent' HP Chromebook 14" for my husband who has never made friends with Windows. Tired of the cursing and dropping of laptops, I bought him a 'pre-scratched', broken in model which was otherwise like new. I setup his Gmail account and plopped it in his lap. At first he was certain there would be nothing better about this laptop than others he'd tried before, but after an hour of using it he exclaimed: "THIS IS GREAT!" (High praise for a man of few words.)The HP Chromebook with the 14" screen is great, for some users. Ideal for those who are not particularly computer savvy, or those users who have primarily web-based needs. Also good for students and travelers who again, use web-based applications and don't plan on installing software on their laptop. For example, I like to travel with a Chromebook because they are lightweight and I use both Gmail and Google Drive all the time. If I was in need of using MS Office, or a photo editing program like Corel's PaintShop Pro X6 (non-web based) - I'd want a different device.To surf the web, use web-based email programs like Microsoft's Outlook, Yahoo, Gmail or similar, and to stream to a Chromecast device via a WebStore Chrome browser extension - this Chromebook works very well.To play non-web based games which must be installed via a CD/DVD player; not on a Chromebook, or to do photo or video editing, or to use any software that installs on your computer versus being played in an internet browser - forget about it. Buy a laptop with a Windows operating system or a Mac instead.The Chromebook will not replace a Windows based operating system PC in terms of functionality. It just won't. That doesn't mean it's a bad device, but it is limited.Ideal for 'simple' use, quick, portable, with a nice sized 14" screen (I wouldn't bother with the 11" screen, but that's me...), and full-sized keyboard, the HP Chromebook 14-c050 was a very good option for my Windows-challenged husband. He's happy. I'm happy. And it works as expected. I recommend Chromebooks, as long as you know what you're getting, and also know what your needs are and whether or not this device can make things happen for you.NOTE:  If you just can't fathom carrying a Windows-based PC laptop around, consider a Windows Surface tablet instead.NOTE: You can use Chromebooks to pair with Chromecast devices (any laptop with a Chrome browser can do this too) via a Chrome browser Chromecast extension, to 'cast' or mirror content on any connected HDTV!  It's a great way to supplement free over-the-air TV, which I mention in my book: Simple Guide to Over-the-Air Free TV.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Computer for Young Adults
Reviews.Author: John Yeary "John Yeary Greenville Java Users ...
Reviews.Content: The computer is really nice for my son who likes the larger screen vs. the Acer C7 Chromebook which is much smaller. The system is responsive and has been working flawlessly.My only real complaint is that the keyboard is not very nice. We have had some keys stick already, and it has been only a week since Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Stable, long lasting and light weight
Reviews.Author: L. Rychel "nightcrawler"
Reviews.Content: After reading review after review on Chromebooks / Android devices I settled on this model.  It was the only one I found which had all the features of a laptop in a non Windows operating system.  Frankly, my #1 goal was to get off the Update / Security issue merry-go-round.  This Chromebook boots in seconds has a nice firm keyboard, is light to carry and an excellent display.  The wireless works flawlessly.  Easy to use, stable and fast.  What else can I say?

Reviews.Title: Love this Chromebook
Reviews.Author: M. Wilson
Reviews.Content: I got this at a black Friday sale for $220 and I love this new computer. I attached a USB mouse and set up Google cloud print and it is acting like my work laptop or any other laptop. It's like my android smart met an IPAD with a keyboard on steroids. It's very light weight and as little heat coming off the bottom. I am thrilled I got this for Christmas. It immediately connected to my WiFi and I was on the web in 2 mins. I have watched videos on youtube and several others from other sites and it performed well. LCD is clear and processor is fast. No complaints at all on this purchase. The 14 screen is excellent. I researched the best chrome extension and apps and have loaded them and they seem to working well. Not sure how you can go wrong if you are looking for an alternate to windows and want more than an IPAD, plus this thing starts up in seconds. Love it.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Waldemar Kurylonek
Reviews.Content: for surfing web it is a great machinemy wife loves it, easy to operate, quick restart, battery holds charge finevery nice security, can set up not only passwordbut can have a call with pin number in order to access itvery nice

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: edgar miller3
Reviews.Content: It works even better with a wireless mouse. The pebble grain touch pad doesn't work very well. Huge improvement going wireless,

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly Surprised!!!!  Great for everything that I do.
Reviews.Author: Dawn Knabenshue
Reviews.Content: I didn't know much about the Chrome operating system before I purchased my Chromebook.  Let me tell you, this laptop is far better than any windows based PC I have ever owned.  Chrome OS does take a little getting used to but once you get you to it, you will find that you like it better than windows.  It is fast, light, and very easy to use.  My mother in law ( who has used a windows laptop for a few years and always has problems doing the most simple tasks also has one and she absolutely loves it!!!!!  She has not called us with questions about how to navigate/use her Chromebook.I would certainly purchase another when the time comes and would recommend it to anyone.  Love it!!!!

Reviews.Title: chromebook
Reviews.Author: jeffbull50
Reviews.Content: GREATThe simplest, easiest OS from Linux/Google in an HP notebook (?)  yet.Clear, bright, easy user controls - almost beyond belief after years of dealing with Windows from Microsoft.I am hoping for a 17" or greater screen in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great little device for the price!
Reviews.Author: loupav45
Reviews.Content: I've been looking to buy a chromebook for about a month now. I decided on the HP. I think 14" is a little bit too big for what it is. But this device is awesome! Turns on super fast and my room mate and I share it with ease. As soon as  you sign in, it feels like your computer. Hardly any setup involved, just take it out, install the batter, charge it up and you're good to go!The one thing I do NOT like about this, is the keyboard. The keyboard feels horrible, but I am also very particular about things like that.

Reviews.Title: A little disappointed...
Reviews.Author: maggie
Reviews.Content: It's really fast and it's great but when I try to fix the pointer on something I have the worst time. It's really annoying. If it wasn't for that it'd be perfect.

Reviews.Title: HP Chromebook 24-c050
Reviews.Author: Patty Hensley
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Chromebook for my husband.  I asked my daughter what kind of notebook would be best. After investigating different kinds; she suggested the Chromebook.  My husband loves it; I cannot say how I like it.  He always has it.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful CHROME operating system.
Reviews.Author: V6Hawk
Reviews.Content: I bought from Best Buy and i'm absolutely in love with this lightweight OS. It does everything I need to do, as long as i'm on the 4G or connected to Wifi. It's a great laptop for browsing the web, doc. editing with Google Drive, and all in a very sleek, light design. Highly recommend this laptop running the GOOGLE CHROME OPERATING SYSTEM.

Reviews.Title: Not what you think
Reviews.Author: Jon Friesell
Reviews.Content: I have 4 printers for some reason this computer could not connect with any of it. I ordered an new printer that says its cloud ready and it would not connect either. I sat on support line for a few hours between the printer and cloud services without any end working item. The seller was a bit of a pain telling me I was computer illiterate. Not a good transaction at all........

Reviews.Title: Fast and Economical
Reviews.Author: Robert Young
Reviews.Content: I like the Chromebook. I would like to see more in the applications from other OS. GREAT use of the Cloud.

Reviews.Title: COMMENTS
Reviews.Author: Robert L Coppo
Reviews.Content: ONLY BAD COMMENT IS THAT THE KEYBOARD IS IN LOWER CASE . HARD TO READ. HELP GETTING GOING WAS VERY GOOD. i LIKE THE EASE OF IT'S USE. dIFFERENT FROM OTHER COMPUTERS BUT A NICE CHANGE.

Reviews.Title: I expected more but never had a notebook before spoiled with my house hp pavilion with Internet 8
Reviews.Author: Ray C.
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a good laptop and love hp products and use Google all the time but I like building a desktop for easy access this uses folders and you have to open them up I also can't do certain things like browse other engine's because of the chrome yes I did buy this laptop knowing it was controlled by Google I am happy with my purchase but would rather have a normal laptop with the option to choose what and where I want to search and download . Meaning the compatability issues with other search engines

Reviews.Title: Fast
Reviews.Author: Rick Bergami
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this.  Very fast, lightweight and great battery life.  I would highly recommend this.  There is really only one program I can't use with this (log me in)

Reviews.Title: Been my primary machine since it came out!
Reviews.Author: Dan S. "DannyStojo"
Reviews.Content: I've had this machine since the day after it was first released.However I've got the 2GB RAM Version, not this one with the 4GB.  I imagine the 4GB would be a bit peppier, but overall they are exactly the same machine.  The screen is big, and bright, and while there is glare if the sun is immediately behind you, there isn't much that this machine can't handle.  It's one of the understated Chromebooks I feel, since it was given a lot of slack for it's poor battery life.  It gets me around 4 hours use generally, though it's been nearly two years and the battery is getting a bit worn out.No complaints though, it is a great tool for me.

Reviews.Title: Difficult to set up
Reviews.Author: Carole
Reviews.Content: I could not access the router directions on a cd because the chromebook would not recognize the cd drive that I purchased until I connected to the internet which I could not do without the router. Several people tried to help but it was more than a week before  I found a technician familiar with chromebooks who could walk me through the process.  Some instructions on the computer would have been helpful for setup and general usage. When I have more time, I'll locate the manual and find out what this computer can do but until then I'll give it two stars for being well priced.

Reviews.Title: Excellent...
Reviews.Author: DJ
Reviews.Content: Perfect for browsing. User friendly. Fast browsing. Very easy set-up. Delivery time was great. Nice looking laptop. Was exactly the kind of laptop I wanted.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: Good working product. It works very well and good resolution. No bad things and great for school thank you very much

Reviews.Title: MY LAPTOP
Reviews.Author: geraldine guelich
Reviews.Content: SINCE THIS IS MY FIRST LAPTOP, BUT I HAVE USED OTHERS IN THE PAST, I REALLY LIKE THE EASE USE SINCE I AM NOT MOST COMPUTER USER.  I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT ANYONE WHO ASKS

Reviews.Title: Husband loves it
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Wallerman
Reviews.Content: Bought this chromebook because I needed something reliable for my husband. His other laptops always got viruses so we bought this one and not a problem so far.

Reviews.Title: Great for students
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Moran
Reviews.Content: My wife had one and I couldn't resist not getting one.  This item is perfect for internet only users and people who use online storage.  Super fast, super satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Good deal.
Reviews.Author: Clare
Reviews.Content: I bought this for Valentines's Day for my husband.  He is just now using a computer and makes navigation easy.  The only downside is that it is a finger print magnet.  Drives me crazy, but doesn't seem to bother him at all.  Other than that, comes with lots of apps and is a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Perfect gift!
Reviews.Author: Rose Ann Sickinger
Reviews.Content: My daughter loved how easy it was to set up and start using! Software loaded was easy to use and it truly is a lightweight laptop

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: LizzySparks
Reviews.Content: I needed a new laptop. I posted the question and asked a lot of people about what I should get. I have an android phone and a kindle fire that I use all the time. I was tired of using a different smaller laptop with a older version on word and windows. I mainly use computers for internet.  I knew that the chrome books were all cloud based computing- and figured I would give it a try.So far- exactly what I wanted and didnt realize exactly what I need. Lots of short cuts or apps from the Chrome store/ google play options.I am able to have my Amazon MP3s play while surfing the web or playing a video on netflix.Google docs is perfect for what I am using it for- just a few simple letters or papers every now and then.You have to have a printer with bluetooth or wireless printing capabilitiesSUPER quick start up, shut down and restart.  Battery life is okay. On a full charge with 4 tab of internet searching, facebooking/ and music playing I can get about 3 hours.

Reviews.Title: I'm through with Windows
Reviews.Author: Jim Moore
Reviews.Content: I just received this product and I could not be happier. Within less than 1 minute this computer was on and ready for me to personalize it. I am already a Chrome junkie so as soon as I entered my user name and password I was on the internet. I've already bookmarked some of my favorite sites ( Slacker Radio and my previous homepage.) I've never used the mouse pad or a laptop keyboard so I connected my old keyboard and my mouse and it worked great. I'm typing on my previous keyboard now. Connecting my printer was so easy it couldn't believe  I can already print. My previous computer ( Dell Windows XP ) was giving me the "blue screen of death" for several days. I will NEVER have another Windows computer. I'm not a big gamer and I don't download music, Slacker Radio is all I needed. I've already logged into my banking account to make sure I could still do online banking. It would take my Windows XP computer 5 minutes to boot up and with this it takes about 5 to 10 seconds.  If anyone is having second thoughts about a Chromebook, and you just need email and basic computer, you will not be disappointed.  The tracking e-mail from Fed Ex advised this would be delivered on March 7th and I received it today. I could not be happier with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Chrome book well worth it!
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Land
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my oldest son for Christmas; price was right and it runs off if Wifi.  He only uses the internet goes on Facebook so it's perfect.

Reviews.Title: Power Cord is Fragile
Reviews.Author: A Mom Who Knows
Reviews.Content: I bought this device 10 days ago, and the power cord has already split in two with normal wear and tear. Be cautious and maybe purchase an extra power cord to have on hand just in case you need it sooner than you might think. I wish I had!Otherwise, I like this notebook so far.

Reviews.Title: Sparkling refurb
Reviews.Author: Troy D. Wheeler
Reviews.Content: I love the chrome book and it's cloud concept. Works and looks great. I would recommend this to anyone who just wants to check email & surf the web.

Reviews.Title: Nice Machine
Reviews.Author: Scott Johnsen
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my Mother for Christmas.  She does a bit of word processing and looks at email.  She is very excited to have a laptop.  This is a good low cost machine for her needs.It took me about 3-4 hours to understand the Chromebook concept.  I was trying to plug  a printer into this machine to print..wrong concept.  The idea is that you set up the printer on the old machine to allow the Chromebook to send the job over the internet.  Worked fine after I grasped the concept.  Forget the old "plug and play" concept....unless maybe you have a Chromebook specific printer.The Chrome concept that you use Google ducuments in lieu of Microsoft Office.  Her files were Microsoft Works documents.  These would not convert directly to Google docs.  I was able to call them up in Word, save and email them to myself.  This allowed Google docs to open and convert.I think that I have rid my mom of worrying about Microft upgrades as well as we security software such as McAfee, etc.

Reviews.Title: Great so far
Reviews.Author: Bill R
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my parents. So far it's a pretty slick machine. Perfect for their needs. All they do is check email/facebook. My Dad will play solitaire as well. All can be done on this computer, you just have to navigate the Aps instead of saving things to the hard drive. I'm sure there will be a learning curve but so far so good. After using it I'll likely make it my next purchase once my 7 year old macbook goes. for the price point, and surfing the web it's a good fit.

Reviews.Title: Awesome work station
Reviews.Author: David Tutt
Reviews.Content: You must know first what the product is, and its limitations. This is great for internet research and has great tools you can find at the App Store. Awesome workstation!

Reviews.Title: Many Pros, But the Cons Outweigh
Reviews.Author: Jas
Reviews.Content: Before I went off to college I wanted a newer laptop. I bought this laptop after being persuaded by a salesman at Office Max that it was the better choice over the regular 17' HP laptop. After opening the laptop and beginning to use it I noticed some things were very different. You cannot download any Microsoft Office software and many other things, such as oovoo. When using Google Docs(aka the Microsoft Word of Google Chrome) you have to have an internet connection just for it to save.  The worst con for me was the fact that you can only print from this laptop if it is a wireless printer. Tryand connect a regular printer all you want but it won't work. But the pros are the price, the lightness of the laptop, and the app store that comes already downloaded.

Reviews.Title: HP Chromebook
Reviews.Author: P. Lynn
Reviews.Content: This Chromebook was purchased simply for use of the Internet.  It works perfectly for that purpose and enables me to research without any accounts, emails, or identity attached since I log in as a guest daily.  Great price for the quality.

Reviews.Title: So far I love it
Reviews.Author: LaraLorraine
Reviews.Content: My old computer is dieing and I'm tired of all the 'main stream' OSs out there.  No, really.  After my last phone update, I was just done.Now, I do most of my computer use online these days and I don't do photo editing or anything, so this is working great.My only real issue at the moment is that my year old cannon printer is not cloud ready, so I'll need a new printer when the old computer finally gives up the ghost.

Reviews.Title: Purchased for a 17 year old student
Reviews.Author: Anthony T "Avid Reader"
Reviews.Content: It is a nice size for school and does everything my kid wants it to do including streaming Netflix.  She loves it.

Reviews.Title: Cheap key board.
Reviews.Author: toolman1
Reviews.Content: The enter key was sticking on computer. Beware if you want send the product back to the seller save the boxes, I did not(I only had it for two weeks).Had to send it back to HP and wait and wait for it to be fix.

Reviews.Title: Not very sturdy, lacks qualty apps
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have never had any issues with HP and they're a great company but I think they could have done a much better job on the build quality of this Chromebook, it feels somewhat flimsy and thrown together and just short of "cheaply made". I really hate to knock HP but have seen much better quality in this price range.Though I am aware of what a Chromebook is I am very disappointed in the lack of quality apps available in the Chrome Webstore.

Reviews.Title: Would not buy again...
Reviews.Author: J. Reynolds
Reviews.Content: I really expected much more from this notebook. I did not mind that it would not work with Microsoft software, at the time, but I now realize that it is very, very limited in functionality.I was led to believe that a lot of work could be done offline once programs were downloaded. Not the case. I bought this, specifically, so that I could work while traveling on the train for 16 hours. Without internet access the unit is useless. I really needed some type of word processing but the only available programs needed online access, such as Google Docs.So, this has turned into a pretty expensive, very limited toy or video player.I would not buy this type, I would always go for one that uses Microsoft software so that I am able to use the program while off line.

Reviews.Title: Stinks - Do not buy
Reviews.Author: Michael W. Yacenda
Reviews.Content: If you have Windows 8 you will hate the Chromebook ... no right click, search stinks, cant turn off the sound effects, no control panel, no java.I am ready to trash it. It pings every time i clcik soething and you cant turn the damn thing off.I cant fix the typos in this review because you cant right click on the word.I hate it.

Reviews.Title: Works as a tablet with a keyboard
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: Works very quickly, not all apps can be found for the chromebook though. Skype isn't made for it yet. Overall pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Uhh, could do without
Reviews.Author: Jazmyne Williamson
Reviews.Content: I would not get this computer if it will be your main computer. The computer is internet based and you cannot do anything without it. If you are in the government this is a complete no go since you cannot access any government sites.

Reviews.Title: Hate it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Received it as a gift from a relative because she didn't like it. While she just didn't like the Chrome OS, I didn't like the PC for different reasons. I have no problem with the Chome OS because I was fully aware of its limitations.The good: instant boot-up time, no maintenance required, and..... yeah, that's pretty much it.The bad: everything elsePC is too slow, web browsing is slow, PC becomes momentarily unresponsive when going back to a previous webpage, I lose wifi connection every now and then, poor battery life and has trouble holding a charge, poor keyboard (for example, pressing BACKSPACE just now went back to a previous webpage instead of deleting a letter and thus I had to start all over and rewrite this review for this poor product again), lackluster display with washed out colors, PC always resets my screen brightness back to default every time I boot it up, ...oh, and did I mention the PC is just TOO SLOW?I just hope that my relative didn't have to pay more than 200 bucks for this problem child.

Reviews.Title: Great Chromebook From HP
Reviews.Author: BillPen
Reviews.Content: Bought my HP Chromebook at Staples for $170 plus tax on Thanksgiving, waited 20 minutes in line for the two available.  Own HP laptop w/windows 7 and HP desktop with windows XP.  I cannot believe how fast Chrome operates, so simple to use and numerous times faster than my Laptop.  Don't even compare to desktop with XP, absolutely slow.  After April 2014 will dump the desktop with XP.  If web browsing and E-mail are your primary uses, this is the best, Chromebook that is!

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Robert Ireland
Reviews.Content: I have not been able to spend much time with it but feel that it is exactly what I wanted and what was advertised

Reviews.Title: Excited
Reviews.Author: Raquel M. Martinez "Madness"
Reviews.Content: The Chromebook got here really fast despite the standard shipping.The computer itself was really well packaged...can't say much about the computer since everything that was promised is included with the item. I'm going to add the great customer service and the constant updates.

Reviews.Title: Not happy.........
Reviews.Author: L. Ingram
Reviews.Content: I thought this would be a super alternative to my dying Toshiba. It wasn't.... No Java so no online gaming. Was told by the tech that they are not "legally" able to have Java and have a watered down version of it. After power washing it and mailing it back for thirty dollars, I got a refund minus another hundred and fifty dollars.  Make sure, positively sure, it is what you need.  I liked that it synced to my phone, it was light and cute but I couldn't keep it.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY, THEY DO NOT STAND BEHIND THEIR PRODUCTS.
Reviews.Author: Michael Olejar
Reviews.Content: The enter key will not work, and the company would not send me a replacement. They will only repair it after you send it back to them at your expense.

Reviews.Title: Who knew they even had computer that don't support Windows!?!
Reviews.Author: Saffire968
Reviews.Content: My daughter was in need of a new laptop, she thought this one looked really nice for the $.  It arrives and she suddenly realizes it does not run the Windows platform, nor any of the programs she needs for school.  We contact Amazon immediately, get the run around for over a week, and then are told because of the low price it is non-returnable!  I will never purchase another item from an Amazon distributor ever again!

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Celeron 847
4 GB DDR3
16 GB Solid-State Drive
14.0-Inch Screen
Chrome
ProductInfo.Name: HP Chromebook 14-c050 (Sparkling Black)
